column4: i got alsa mixer to detect my soundcard finally, but i still am getting no sound. Any suggestions?
The sound is most likely muted
There are lots of channels.  >> https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/alsa-driver/+bug/156930 << Try this
Did you read my link yet?
You set all the channels to 100%?  And no sound?
Are your speakers turned on?  Try a pair of headphones in the port, instead.
You need to do more troubleshooting, because if it works in ALSA, then it is playing somewhere...
it doesn't work in alsa. it just detects it
options snd-hda-intel model=toshiba was in quotes at the bottom of /etc/modprobe.d/alsa-base
i appreciate the help. thanks a lot. i understand its not very fun trying to troubleshoot others problems
Glad to hear you're fixed up. Hey...
Want some advice you'll thank me for later?
Make a backup of that file.  Save it in your /home directory, print it out somewhere, save it in a million places, because you'll bump into this again with that computer.
